As a test engineer you will be part of a highly motivated test organization with locations in Brande, Aalborg, Lyngby and Aoiz, where corporation is a necessity. Your area of responsibility will be within mechanical testing of blade materials and the related data analysis.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In this position your main work will be:\n suppliers of test equipment and technologies.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   What you need to make a difference:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Passion for mandatory;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You are specialized or have experienced in mechanical testing and are acquainted with testing of sandwich materials and FRP materials;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You are also familiar with extensometers, load cells, thermocouples, strain gauges and other related sensors and systems;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You are an expert level user of Microsoft Office, primarily Excel;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experience in setting up test plans and documentation of experiments is required;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experience with Matlab or related data processing will be a <div>\n  It takes the brightest minds to be a technology leader. It takes imagination to create green energy for the generations to come. At Siemens Gamesa we make real what matters, join our global team.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Blade Product portfolio manager within Blade Module Management\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Siemens Gamesa has a vision for renewable energy: we believe in the power of nature and technology. Help us to be ready to face the energy challenges of tomorrow and make a green footprint – join us in creating a better future for our planet.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   We focus on hiring the best people, wherever they may be in the world. We pride ourselves on the flexibility we offer to our employees and are committed to building a workforce that can grow with the company. Siemens Gamesa is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In our culture of trust, we focus on empowerment, diversity and continuous learning. Valuing our people is what makes us one global team, with our colleagues’ safety at the heart of our organization.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   For our Blade Module Management department within the Technology organization, we are looking for an experience project manager. As project manager, you will be working in close collaboration with the technical experts and line management to accomplish projects on budget and time.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   How to contribute to our vision\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   As Blade Project manager you will lead projects with full responsibility for the results, driving the development of technical solutions that are right on time and help improve the competitive position of SGRE in the marketplace. You’ll interact with technical areas and stakeholders placed in an international working environment.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   You are responsible for successfully executing a great variety of projects within the value chain of blades where you will be expected to\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Have full project responsibility in terms of time, cost and quality delivered<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Lead the project teams in close cooperation with the technically responsible engineers, solution owners and Chief Engineers<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Execute projects in accordance with Siemens Gamesa Technology processes and tools<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Coordinate with the various technology department, production and procurement as well with external suppliers and partners<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   What you need to make a difference\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Passion for renewable energy and a sense for the importance to lead the change. We are looking for person with a good technical and project understanding. You hold a MSc degree in a mechanical or aeronautical engineering or similar technical field as well as relevant experience in project management. You have working experience in a manufacturing company preferably within the wind, automotive, naval or aerospace industry.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Furthermore, you have the following characteristics:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Successful track record with project management and leadership<\u002Fli>\n  <li> A formal project management training is a big plus<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Living and\u002For working experience in an intercultural environment<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Structured and organized and able to lead change<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Outgoing, determined and persistent with strong communication and collaboration skills<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Motivated by making things happen and at the same time shaping the strategy and direction of the future<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Excellent English skills both orally and in writing are a must in the international team, and it is of highest importance that you can communicate your results in a clear and convincing manner.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In return of your commitment we offer you…\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Become a part of our mission for sustainability: Clean energy for generations to come. We are a global team of diverse colleagues who share a passion for renewable energy and have a culture of trust and empowerment to make our own ideas a reality. We focus on personal and professional development to grow internally within our organization. Responsible for implementing TPM and lean manufacturing concepts\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   How to contribute to our vision\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ensures adherence to defined guidelines, processes and procedures, and ensures achievement of agreed performance standards<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Oversees and monitors maintenance procedures<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Plans resources and routine maintenance project<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Responsible for monitoring maintenance plans; Training to maintenance teams and operational teams<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Oversees operational processes, and leads employees in the team assigned<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Implements TPM and suggests improvements<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   What you need to make a difference\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical or Electrical engineering or related field or equivalent combination of education and experience.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Previous experience in a similar position<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Security and Environment are a priority and is results oriented<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good planning capacity, organized and disciplined<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Strong knowledge of TPM and Lean Manufacturing<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to work successfully with a team daily in a fast-paced and dynamic environment<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Strong communication skills<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Advanced knowledge of English<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Weekend Shift. He\u002Fshe is either a Quality Professional, a Quality Technician with managerial experience.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Some of your key tasks will include but are not be limited to:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Leads an assigned global quality team located in several countries. parties.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ensures implementation and improvement of the quality part of the Integrated Management System (including process management) for the respective organization unit according programs.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Contributes to product safety activities.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ensures the quality reporting.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Contributes to budget planning processes.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> located in several countries<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Travel is expected;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Provide regular communication regarding strategy and execution to internal stakeholders<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Provide technical expertise to SGRE Plant Quality teams.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Responsible for changes in control plans, inspection records, control instructions and analyze change requests.<\u002Fli>\n It takes imagination to create green energy for the generations to come. At Siemens Gamesa we make real what matters, join our global team.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   A Siemens Gamesa tem uma visão para as energias renováveis: Acreditamos no poder da natureza e da tecnologia. Ajude-nos a estar preparados para os desafios energéticos de amanhã e fazer uma pegada ecológica verde – Junte-se à equipa para criar um futuro melhor para nós e para o nosso planeta.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Focamo-nos em contratar os melhores profissionais, onde quer que estejam no mundo. Orgulhamo-nos da flexibilidade que oferecemos aos nossos colaboradores e estamos empenhados em construir uma equipa que possa crescer com a empresa. A Siemens Gamesa é uma entidade patronal que diz não à descriminação e promove a igualdade de oportunidades de emprego. Celebramos a diversidade e estamos empenhados em criar um ambiente inclusivo para todos os colaboradores.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Na nossa cultura de confiança, focamo-nos na capacitação, diversidade e aprendizagem contínua. A apreciação dos nossos colaboradores é o que nos torna uma equipa global, pois a segurança dos nossos colaboradores está no centro da nossa organização.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Como contribuir para a nossa visão:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Garantir a gestão da Formação Inicial de Acolhimento na Ria Blades a todos os novos colaboradores, bem como colaborar em todo o processo de gestão da formação.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Assegurar a ligação entre a Produção, restantes áreas e os Recursos Humanos, no sentido de dar o suporte necessário no âmbito da implementação e seguimento das ferramentas de melhoria contínua<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Assegurar o planeamento e atualização ao nível da conceção da formação, nomeadamente no que respeita à calendarização, estrutura, adaptação a diferentes áreas produtivas, desenvolvimento e atualização de manuais pedagógicos de suporte. Garantir a monitoria dos módulos teóricos e práticos da sua responsabilidade, bem como dar suporte aos restantes formadores. Garantir os vários níveis de avaliação da formação, de acordo com os procedimentos em vigor, bem como partilhar informação relevante com a direção de Recursos Humanos e as respetivas chefias, no que respeita ao não cumprimento de requisitos mínimos de avaliação. Assegurar a organização e limpeza das salas afetas ao Centro de Formação, bem como de todos os recursos afetos.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Colaborar no processo de diagnóstico de necessidades de formação e respetiva elaboração do plano de formação; na conceção dos projetos de formação, na execução dos mesmos (apoio pedagógico e logístico) e na garantia dos registos necessários e apoiar na implementação das várias metodologias de avaliação dos projetos de formação.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Participar, sempre que necessário, como formador interno no âmbito das suas áreas de competência.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Emitir e implementar sugestões de melhoria com o objetivo de optimizar\u002Fmelhorar processos na Organização. Pilotar (dinamizar e monotorizar) a implementação de sugestões de melhoria junto da Equipa de RH.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Reportar e propor planos de ação no que diz respeito ao KPI das Sugestões de Melhoria e outros seguidos internamente. Assegurar a gestão, o controlo e o reporte de custos associados aos consumos do Centro de Formação.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Propor e dinamizar a elaboração e\u002Fou revisão de processos e procedimentos no âmbito de Recursos Humanos, com vista ao desenvolvimento e otimização dos mesmos; colaborar na disponibilização de informação destinada aos colaboradores, com a finalidade de promover e divulgar as práticas e procedimentos de Recursos Humanos.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Colaborar no esclarecimento de questões de âmbito legal\u002Flaboral aos colaboradores<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   O que precisas para fazer a diferença:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Habilitações Académicas: Ensino Secundário ou Ensino Superior<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Formação Profissional: Certificado de Competências Pedagógicas<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experiência Profissional: No mínimo 2 anos de experiência na área<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Informática na Ótica do Utilizador (pacote office &amp; programas de gestão da fromação)<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Excelente capacidade de comunicação e interacção<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Conhecimento avançado de Inglês<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Em troca do seu compromisso, oferecemos...\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Fazer parte da nossa missão de sustentabilidade: Energia limpa para as gerações futuras<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Uma equipa global de diversos colegas que partilham a paixão pelas energias renováveis<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Confiança e capacitação para pôr as suas ideias em prática<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Desenvolvimento pessoal e profissional para crescer internamente com a nossa organização<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Pacote salarial atraente<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Benefícios locais como vales de refeição, descontos de empregados e muito mais<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Capacitação dos nossos colaboradores\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n    https:\u002F\u002Fwww.siemensgamesa.com\u002Fsustainability\u002Femployees\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Como imagina o futuro?\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n    https:\u002F\u002Fyoutu.be\u002F12Sm678tjuY\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   A nossa equipa global está na vanguarda da luta contra a crise climática, reduzindo as emissões de carbono – o maior desafio que enfrentamos.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Os candidatos com deficiência severa são encorajados a contactar-nos. The Blade Technology Department works on cutting edge technology in an international environment. The job will expose the engineer to a wide range of tasks allowing personal and technical growth and achieving a deep understanding of wind turbine blades.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   How to contribute to our vision\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   As a Blade Structural Engineer, you are expected to take a leading role in the development of the structural technologies for the next generation of blades. As a part of your work you will\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Act as technical lead for the development of composite structures and adhesive joints<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Contribute to technology development projects with regards to blade structures<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Be the technical owner of the technical component roadmap<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Work with a value chain approach to optimize the product in collaboration with different interfaces<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Establish a clear understanding of design drivers and have a structures approach to expand the boundaries<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Manage project with internal and external stakeholders and secure good and close communication<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <br> What you need to make a difference\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Passion for renewable energy and a sense for the importance to lead the change. <div>\n  It takes the brightest minds to be a technology leader. It takes imagination to create green energy for the generations to come. At Siemens Gamesa we make real what matters, join our global team.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Siemens Gamesa has a vision for renewable energy: we believe in the power of nature and technology. Help us to be ready to face the energy challenges of tomorrow and make a green footprint – join the team in creating a better future for us on our planet.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   We focus on hiring the best people, wherever they may be in the world. We pride ourselves on the flexibility we offer to our employees and are committed to building a workforce that can grow with the company. Siemens Gamesa is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In our culture of trust, we focus on empowerment, diversity and continuous learning. Valuing our people is what makes us one global team, with our colleagues’ safety at the heart of our organization.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   How to contribute to our vision\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   For our newly created test team in our Siemens Gamesa Renewable Energy Plant in Vagos we are looking for a test engineer who specializes in mechanical testing of composites. As a test engineer you will be part of a highly motivated test organization with locations in Brande, Aalborg, Lyngby and Aoiz, where corporation is a necessity. Your area of responsibility will be within mechanical testing of blade materials and the related data analysis.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In this position your main work will be:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Specification of tests in collaboration with the design engineers, along with the subsequent analysis and reporting.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintenance and calibration of test equipment and machinery.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Development of test methods, equipment, and facilities.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Contact with local and international testing companies\u002Finstitutions and suppliers of test equipment and technologies.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   What you need to make a difference\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   We are looking for a person with\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> A relevant engineering master’s degree (e.g., mechanical, aerospace engineering or similar).<\u002Fli>\n  <li> 5-10 years of experience from the wind, aerospace or automotive industry or similar industries is a requirement.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You are specialized in or have experience with mechanical testing and are acquainted with testing of sandwich materials and FRP-materials.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You are also familiar with extensometers, load cells, thermocouples, strain gauges, and other related sensors and systems.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You are an expert level user of Microsoft Office, primarily Excel. Experience in setting up test plans and documentation of experiments is required. Experience with Matlab or related data processing tools will be a benefit.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   And the following personal skills\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> You can handle many support- and collaborative oriented tasks working across different departments in a large international organization.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You can work independently and have the desire to drive your own assignments.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You are open minded, flexible, and positive and are determined and persistent when it comes to reach the goals.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You possess strong interpersonal and communication skills and are fluent in English, both orally and in writing<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   You should apply for this position if you are passionate and eager about having a hands-on approach with testing and analysis of blade materials. It would be an additional benefit if you have the urge to develop your technical knowledge and analytical skills with the goal of developing new test- and analytical methods to improve our products. In this position you will have a great possibility to influence the success of both on- and offshore market segments and the transition into a green energy supply.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <i> In case you have acquired your skills in alternative ways your application is just as well appreciated.<\u002Fi>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <i> In return of your commitment we offer you…<\u002Fi>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Become a part of our mission for sustainability: Clean energy for generations to come<\u002Fli>\n  <li> A global team of diverse colleagues who share passion for renewable energy<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Trust and empowerment to make your own ideas reality<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Personal and professional development to grow internally within our organization<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Attractive remuneration package<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Local benefits such as subsided lunch, employee discounts and much more<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Empowering our people\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n    https:\u002F\u002Fwww.siemensgamesa.com\u002Fsustainability\u002Femployees\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   How do you imagine the future?\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n    https:\u002F\u002Fyoutu.be\u002F12Sm678tjuY\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Our global team is on the front line of tackling the climate crisis, reducing carbon emissions – the greatest challenge we face.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <i> Siemens Gamesa is an equal opportunity employer and maintains a work environment that is free from discrimination and where employees are treated with dignity and respect. Employment at Siemens Gamesa is based solely on an individual's merit and qualifications, which are directly related to job competence. Siemens Gamesa does not discriminate against any employee or job applicant on the basis of race, ethnicity, nationality, ancestry, genetic information, citizenship, religion, age, gender, gender identity\u002Fexpression, sexual orientation, pregnancy, marital status, disability or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, rules or regulations. We adhere to these principles in all aspects of employment, including recruiting, hiring, training, compensation, promotion and benefits.<\u002Fi>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <i><br> We are driven by people - from more than 100 different countries, they build the company we are every day. Our diverse and inclusive culture encourages us to think outside the box, speak without fear, and be bold. Ajude-nos a estar preparados para os desafios energéticos de amanhã e fazer uma pegada ecológica verde – Junte-se à equipe para criar um futuro melhor para nós e para o nosso planeta.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Nos focamos em contratar os melhores profissionais, onde quer que estejam no mundo. Nós celebramos a diversidade e estamos comprometidos em criar um ambiente inclusivo para todos os colaboradores.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Na nossa cultura de confiança, nos focamos no empoderamento, diversidade, e aprendizagem contínua. Como contribuir para a nossa visão:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Concluir o processamento logístico operacional básico aprovado dentro do cronograma (Recebimento de Mercadorias \u002F initiatives<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   What you need to make a difference\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Passion for renewable energy and a sense for the importance to lead the change.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   The ideal candidate must have an engineering background with composite material sciences and structural mechanics.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In our culture of trust, we focus on empowerment, diversity and continuous learning. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In our culture of trust, we focus on empowerment, diversity and continuous learning. <div>\n  It takes the brightest minds to be a technology leader. It takes imagination to create green energy for the generations to come. At Siemens Gamesa we make real what matters, join our global team.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Siemens Gamesa has a vision for renewable energy: we believe in the power of nature and technology. Help us to be ready to face the energy challenges of tomorrow and make a green footprint – join the team in creating a better future for us on our planet.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   We focus on hiring the best people, wherever they may be in the world. We pride ourselves on the flexibility we offer to our employees and are committed to building a workforce that can grow with the company. Siemens Gamesa is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In our culture of trust, we focus on empowerment, diversity and continuous learning. Valuing our people is what makes us one global team, with our colleagues’ safety at the heart of our organization.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   How to contribute to our vision:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Purpose of the role:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   The Master Data Coordinator is responsible for managing all material creation, extension and activation requests that are addressed to the team for supporting product trials, development and product changes. This position is also responsible for working with the appropriate functional areas to collect the correct Master Data information to drive data accuracy while improving system efficiency and effectiveness.- Supports the PLM and conducts and coordinates logistics activities in projects, in order to contribute to the success of the project by accurate and on schedule customer supply.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Stakeholders:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Strategic Procurement , Operational Procurement, Planning, Technology, PMO organization, another cross functional partners.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Tasks:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ensures Master Data integrity in SAP system and maintains the processes to support the data quality<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Participate in projects and initiatives across multiple functional areas and regions<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Provide assistance in resolving data quality issue through the appropriate choice of error detection and correction, process control and improvement, or process design strategies collaborating with subject matter experts (SMEs) and data stewards<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Upload and maintain material master fields in SAP system<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains a 24-48 turn-around time for all incoming requests<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Coordinate urgent cases where agility is the key<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ensures data integrity and compliance by performing data cleansing, data audits, and data validation<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   What you need to make a difference:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Passion for renewable energy and a sense for the importance to lead the change. We are also looking for:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Excellent time management skills, ability to multi-task effectively and be comfortable working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment without close guidance or supervision<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Results driven, self-sufficient and highly motivated<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Analytically minded and a methodical problem solver<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Very good interpersonal skills with excellent customer service<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to understand complex data requirements, and be able to identify and offer multiple solution options to facilitate the best outcome (e.g. automated transformation vs. manual enrichment)<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Strong influencing, facilitating, and consulting skills in working with stakeholders at all levels in the organization and across departments<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Excellent oral and written skills to effectively communicate complex ideas and concepts, and provide clear documentation<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to quickly adapt to changes in timelines and sequences, deal with ambiguity, and succeed against in a high-pressure environment<\u002Fli>\n  <li> 1-3 years experience managing master data across a complex international supply chain in an ERP environment. SAP Key User expertise (preferably within Cross Applications) preferred<\u002Fli>\n  <li> 1-3 years contributing to the development of new concepts, techniques, and standards.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> 1-3 years developing solutions to complex problems which may require some ingenuity and innovation. Ensures solutions are consistent with organization precedents and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> 1-3 years being part of a project management team in supply chain or other global cross-functional position.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Overall understanding of logistics and business processes.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In return of your commitment we offer you:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Become a part of our mission for sustainability: Clean energy for generations to come<\u002Fli>\n  <li> A global team of diverse colleagues who share passion for renewable energy<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Trust and empowerment to make your own ideas reality<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Personal and professional development to grow internally within our organization<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Attractive remuneration package<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Local benefits such as subsided lunch, employee discounts and much more<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Empowering our people\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n    https:\u002F\u002Fwww.siemensgamesa.com\u002Fsustainability\u002Femployees\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   How do you imagine the future?\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n    https:\u002F\u002Fyoutu.be\u002F12Sm678tjuY\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Our global team is on the front line of tackling the climate crisis, reducing carbon emissions – the greatest challenge we face.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Severely disabled applicants are encouraged to reach out to us. We have inclusive recruiting processes specifically for severely disabled persons in Portugal and we do our utmost to tailor working spaces to suit your individual needs. In cases of severe disability, applicants who are equally qualified will be given preferential consideration.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <i> Siemens Gamesa is an equal opportunity employer and maintains a work environment that is free from discrimination and where employees are treated with dignity and respect. We pride ourselves on the flexibility we offer to our employees and are committed to building a workforce that can grow with the company. Siemens Gamesa is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In our culture of trust, we focus on empowerment, diversity and continuous learning. Valuing our people is what makes us one global team, with our colleagues’ safety at the heart of our organization.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   How to contribute to our vision:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Supervises production tasks assigned according to established quality guidelines and EHS requirements;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Dedicates tasks as necessary to member of assigned production group or production line;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Performs trouble shooting activities in case of technological or procedural problems, as first level of escalation;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Involves superior Supervisor or Management, if necessary;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Initiates ad hoc repair measures in cooperation with Maintenance;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Acts as Senior Operator in the group, and leads operators technically.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   What you need to make a difference is passion for renewable energy and a sense for the importance to lead the change. We are also looking for:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or equivalent professional experience;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experience in KPIs, Lean Manufacturing;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experience in managing teams, conflict resolution;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experience in composite materials (desirable);<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Mandatory knowledge of Portuguese (fluent level) and English (fluent level);<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Available to work in shifts, from Friday to Sunday, from 6pm to 7am (Weekend Shift).<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In return of your commitment we offer you:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Become a part of our mission for sustainability: Clean energy for generations to come;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> A global team of diverse colleagues who share passion for renewable energy;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Trust and empowerment to make your own ideas reality;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Personal and professional development to grow internally within our organization;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Attractive remuneration package;<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Local benefits such as subsided lunch, employee discounts and much more.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Empowering our people\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n    https:\u002F\u002Fwww.siemensgamesa.com\u002Fsustainability\u002Femployees\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   How do you imagine the future?\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n    https:\u002F\u002Fyoutu.be\u002F12Sm678tjuY\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Our global team is on the front line of tackling the climate crisis, reducing carbon emissions – the greatest challenge we face.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Severely disabled applicants are encouraged to reach out to us. <div>\n  It takes the brightest minds to be a technology leader. It takes imagination to create green energy for the generations to come. At Siemens Gamesa we make real what matters, join our global team.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Siemens Gamesa has a vision for renewable energy: we believe in the power of nature and technology. Help us to be ready to face the energy challenges of tomorrow and make a green footprint – join the team in creating a better future for us on our planet.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   We focus on hiring the best people, wherever they may be in the world. We pride ourselves on the flexibility we offer to our employees and are committed to building a workforce that can grow with the company. Siemens Gamesa is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In our culture of trust, we focus on empowerment, diversity and continuous learning. Valuing our people is what makes us one global team, with our colleagues’ safety at the heart of our organization.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   How to contribute to our vision\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   For our Material Master Data Team within the Service business unit, we are looking for 1 skilled and experienced Master Data Analysts.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   You will be working independently with SAP and data administration. Additionally, the Master Data Analyst is also responsible for project management related to systems enhancement and reporting. Your main responsibility area will be to provide assistance to our internal clients by troubleshooting and creating training materials and conducting the trainings together with the team.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   For this position, a hybrid regime of work is applied.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In this role, you will collaborate close with internal partners by participating in projects and initiatives across multiple functional areas and regions and represent the team during governance meetings. Your main tasks will be, among others:\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ensures Master Data integrity in SAP system and maintains the processes to support the data quality<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Provide assistance in resolving data quality issue through the appropriate choice of error detection and correction, process control and improvement, or process design strategies collaborating with subject matter experts (SMEs) and data stewards<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Upload and maintain material master fields in SAP system<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains a 24-48 turn-around time for all incoming requests<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Coordinate urgent cases where agility is the key<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ensures data integrity and compliance by performing data cleansing, data audits, and data validation<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Other duties assigned as needed.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   What you need to make a difference\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Passion for renewable energy and a sense for the importance to lead the change. We are looking for you, who wants to make real what matters and who wants to change the world to renewable energy.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   The ideal candidate has 3 to 5 years experience in SAP and Systems, data management or similar, in combination with thorough practical experience with managing master data across a complex international supply chain in SAP or a similar ERP environment. Specifically, we expect you to have experience with\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <ul>\n  <li> SAP Key User expertise (preferably within Cross Applications)<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Concept development, techniques, and standardization\u002Fautomation (macros)<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Presentation skills and content creation (PPT)<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Developing technically complex solutions and ensuring the solutions are consistent with organization precedents and policies<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Identifying issues and creating technical solutions<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Excellent time management skills, ability to multi-task effectively and be comfortable working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment without close guidance or supervision<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Mandatory fluency in English (C1-C2 Level)<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Results driven, self-sufficient and highly motivated<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Analytically minded and a methodical problem solver<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Very good interpersonal skills with excellent customer service<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to understand complex data requirements, and be able to identify and offer multiple solution options to facilitate the best outcome (e.g. automated transformation vs. manual enrichment)<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Strong influencing, facilitating, and consulting skills in working with stakeholders at all levels in the organization and across departments<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Excellent oral and written skills to effectively communicate complex ideas and concepts, and provide clear documentation<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to quickly adapt to changes in timelines and sequences, deal with ambiguity, and succeed against in a high-pressure environment.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   Most importantly, you challenge yourself and your colleagues to achieve the best results. You have a high professional competency and you have a desire to develop your skills. You have good collaboration skills and you can manage to act in different cultural contexts. To thrive in this position, you must have a strong result- and customer-oriented approach.\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n   In return of your commitment we offer you…\n <\u002Fdiv>\n colleagues who share a passion for renewable energy and have a culture of trust and empowerment to make our own ideas a reality.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> We focus on personal and professional development to grow internally within our organization.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Siemens Gamesa offers a wide variety of benefits such as flexible working hours as well as home-office possibility for many colleagues, employer-funded pension, attractive remuneration package (fixed\u002Fvariable) and local benefits such as subsidized lunch, employee discounts and much more.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n
